Class BuyCardPrompt

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.client.screens.game.prompts.components.prompttypes.BuyCardPrompt
All Implemented Interfaces:
PromptTypeInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuyingBagCard, BuyingReserved, BuyReserveNobleCard
public class BuyCardPrompt extends Object implements PromptTypeInterface
A class responsible for populating Buy card prompt.
